lines:
22 August, 1919

Mr. Sung Sing Kwan 
536 Commonwealth Avenue

Boston, Mass.

Dear Sir:

Your letter addressed to Dr. Stearns has in 
his absence been delivered to Mr. Sawyer. Mr. Sawyer 
has asked me to recommend to you the following surgeons 
in Boston, all of whom have been out to our infirmary 
to treat cases requiring such special céfe as does that

of your frienä, Miss Lee. The names and adäresses are

as fobiows :

Dr. Daniel Fiske Jones, 195 Beacon St. (first) 
Dr. Franklin G. Balch, 279 Clarendon St. (Second)

Dr. Ernest A. Codman, 227 Beacon St.

(Thira)

Mr. Sawyer has also asked me to send you the on -
closed check as a loan, the amount being *300.

Your letter will be called to Dr. Stearns 's atten -
tion upon his return to the office about September 1st.

Very truly yours,

Enclosure

Secretary to the principal
raw: 22 August, 1919 Mr. Sung Sing Kwan 536 Commonwealth Avenue Boston, Mass. Dear Sir: Your letter addressed to Dr. Stearns has in his absence been delivered to Mr. Sawyer. Mr. Sawyer has asked me to recommend to you the following surgeons in Boston, all of whom have been out to our infirmary to treat cases requiring such special céfe as does that of your frienä, Miss Lee. The names and adäresses are as fobiows : Dr. Daniel Fiske Jones, 195 Beacon St. (first) Dr. Franklin G. Balch, 279 Clarendon St. (Second) Dr. Ernest A. Codman, 227 Beacon St. (Thira) Mr. Sawyer has also asked me to send you the onclosed check as a loan, the amount being *300. Your letter will be called to Dr. Stearns 's attention upon his return to the office about September 1st. Very truly yours, Enclosure Secretary to the principal

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter acknowledging letter sent to Alfred Stearns with Mr. Sawyer's recommendations of three Boston surgeons for Miss Lee; check for $300 loan enclosed.
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
metadata.note_preferred-citation: From The Trustees of Phillips Academy.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
